profileAlternative.name: Edwin Veltman
profileAlternative.headline: Javascript Developer at Independent Contractor
profileAlternative.summary:
Front-End / JavaScript Developer

Experience Summary:

Programmer with experience in all aspects of application development, including
prototyping, specification, design, documentation, development, QA, and client support.

Comfortable in working closely with both small and large teams of coders, designers, producers and project managers.

Interested in working on challenging projects in a fast-paced environment.

Several years experience programming e-learning, portfolio and advertising-based
applications, as well as kiosks and various web-based games and tools.

Quick and eager to learn new programming languages and methodologies.

Programming Skills:
Strong coding skills and experience with an eye for good design
HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, jQuery, ActionScript 3, Responsive Design
Experience with PHP, XML, Photoshop, SVN, MDM Zinc, OOP principles

positions.title: Javascript Developer
positions.description:
Currently pursuing an intensive study of React, Redux and associated third-party helpers and components.

Updated the eBay 2016 Spring Seller Update webpages under a tight deadline, fully mobile responsive and integrated into the eBay UI.

Created custom interactive rich-media ads using HTML5, animation tools and plugins, testing and deploying on all major browsers, responsive to varying sizes and orientations of desktops and mobile devices.

Worked closely with producers and designers in creating ads adhering to IAB digital ad guidelines, standards and best practices.

Programmed, maintained and debugged websites and HTML emails.

Constructed interactive menus and customized cost analysis forms for an extensive Hubspot-based website.

Programmed an interactive video with menu navigation, synchronized effects and links for desktop and mobile.

Worked closely with designers and producers to finesse engaging animations.
…
see more

positions.title: Technical Specialist
positions.description:
Solved bugs and technical problems with web ads, performed ad unit QA, implemented tech support for production and sales teams and campaign managers, developed rich-media ads using Flash and JavaScript.

Created a new type of ad unit, using JavaScript and PHP, which gathers data from a recipe webpage and associated database to build a printable recipe page.

Programmed a product carousel in Flash and duplicated it in HTML5 for use in non-Flash environments such as mobile.

Created several webpages for AT&T which were the only ad sites hosted by Flashtalking, rather than the usual practice of only hosting ad units on other pages.
…
see more

positions.title: ActionScript Developer
positions.description:
Coded an interactive web banner for HP featuring animation, rollovers and links, then converted it to JavaScript/JQuery for cross-platform and mobile deployment.

Programmed web-based and stand-alone Flash applications, working independently and in collaboration with other programmers.

Programmed a three-hour cultural training application for Humintell, configurable through XML and a client database, including testing and assessment capabilities.

Created a coverflow-type webpage for RockYou to showcase their online games.

Coded a ROI tool for Blade Network Technologies which emulates a data-intensive spreadsheet.

Programmed an animation/video banner for Adobe's Photoshop Lightroom software.

Created a touchpad control system for use in controlling multiple devices such as dvd players, audio systems, and lighting controls, for use during seminar presentations.

Programmed a multi-language video kiosk in use at hundreds of locations worldwide.

Programmed the Facebook game application Social Nutz, coding all of the Flash, assisting in UI design and both Ruby and Javascript programming.

Coded and helped design the site bunnybot.com (no longer active), a social shopping instant messaging client. Ported to Facebook and Meebo sites.

Updated and coded various webpages and applications for ScreamStream Interactive.

Programmed the Zazzle Flash Panel, in which users and sellers can select Zazzle.com products to create an interactive scrolling gallery to embed in any webpage.

Created the SlideText application, to create text effects that can be embedded in a webpage, for Slide.com.
…
see more

positions.title: Actionscript Developer
positions.description:
Programmed complex interactive mathematics instruction for a small non-profit educational firm.

Converted an interactive mathematics training application from Director to Flash in collaboration with the University of California College Prep Online.

Programmed the computer-mediated learning component of the Learning Conductor, a suite of complex online interactive algebra and geometry instruction sets for entry-level college students.

Programmed Mellie, an interactive bilingual math instruction application for elementary school age children.
…
see more

positions.title: Actionscript / Lingo Software Engineer
positions.description:
Programmed large-project application CD-Roms and websites for the eLearning division of a business-training company with 35 on-site employees.

Programmed the award-winning CD-Roms Houghton-Mifflin Mathsteps, an educational application, Fiat Punto, a sales training application, and Addison Wesley Teacher's Resource Planner, a curriculum management application supplied with textbooks.
Supervised small teams of programming contractors.

Created the Sun StarOffice business-card type CD-Rom as the sole programmer.

Programmed the Online Quiz portion of the Roche Online Bluebook Training by learning ASP from scratch and completing the project under a tight deadline.

Created and documented data management and security procedures.

Built application installers and supervised QA testing.
…
see more
